Text:
Great film..

An absolute must for any SF fan.

Thanks for sharing.

I saw this movie when it was first released and thought it was awful - this was my intro to the world of Richard Stanley.  I then saw Dust Devil, his second feature, and thought it was amazing, so I figured I had to reconsider my initial reaction.  I'll re-watch and let you know what its like after DL'ing.

Where did the seeders go? :(

Really want to get this.  thanks.
